# Welcome to the Pearson Lakes Art Center

### A Creative Gathering Place for All

Since 1965, the Pearson Lakes Art Center has been a place for the Iowa Great Lakes community to enjoy, learn, grow, and create. Today, it is one of Iowa’s leading art centers, serving residents and visitors alike.

PLAC brings world-class visual art, an outdoor sculpture trail, performances, educational programs, and culinary experiences to the Iowa Great Lakes region. Whether you are visiting for the weekend or call the area home, there is something here for you.

Explore our six galleries, annually rotating outdoor sculpture trail, 300-seat performing arts theatre, ArtSmart Interactive Children's Gallery, classrooms, clay studio, library, and gift shop.

Admission is free every day. Attend a performance, explore the galleries, or take a class and create. We look forward to welcoming you to the Pearson Lakes Art Center.

## Explore Our Spaces

The Pearson Lakes Art Center offers galleries, classrooms, theatre, and outdoor spaces where visitors can experience outstanding artists and performers and explore their own creativity. We welcome families with interactive exhibits, hands-on art activities, youth classes, and performances designed for all ages. PLAC is a place for everyone explore, learn, grow, and create!

## Pearson Lakes Art Center Biennial Exhibition 2025

PLAC Biennial Exhibition is on view in the Monte Pearson Gallery through 2/21/26.  
This juried exhibition brings together emerging and established artists who are actively producing and presenting new work.

## Art Smart Interactive Gallery 

The Artsmart Interactive Gallery’s newly renovated space serves as an incubator and engine for art-making and creative exploration within PLAC and the community. With a hands-on learning approach, visitors will experience visual, theatrical, and musical art exhibits directly linked to the PLAC collections. 

## See What Awaits

An exciting and enjoyable array of events is waiting in the wings for everyone who loves beautifully orchestrated performances and stimulating visual arts.
